author: snoopdave
msg: - Now uses multiple <accept> elements for resource collections

author: jaz
msg: implemented ServiceSemaphore; built in locking to prevent services (when defined) from running at the same time; uses database record to work with a cluser of application servers. Three modes are available:
Wait - Waits for the previous service to complete (currently up to 5 minutes)
Fail - Fails when the same service is already running
use the semaphore="none|wait|fail" in the service definition (none is the default when the attribute is not defined)

author: olamy
msg: set type in default build definitions

author: rott
msg: Currently, implementation classes which do not specify an endpoint interface (i.e.  @WebService.endpointInterface=...) cause too many method to be published.  In this case, currently all public methods from all superclasses up to, but not including, java.lang.Object are published.  This is incorrect; only methods from superclasses which carry an  @WebService annotation should be published.
